test.title: Basic main(Object[]) 2
test.source-generated:
<<<< [SOURCES_BEGIN] >>>>
<<<< NAMESPACE="" >>>>
<<<< CODE_UNIT_START="/test" >>>>
class Foo {

  int x = 0;
  int y = 10;

  int getZ() {
    return y * 2;
  }

  int calcB(int b1, int b2) {
    return y * b1 * b2;
  }

  int IF(bool b, int p1, int p2) {
    if (b) {
        return p1;
    } else {
        return p2;
    }

  }

  int test(int a) {
    var z = getZ();
    var b = calcB(z, 3);
    var s = '$this > a: $a ; x: $x ; y: $y ; z: $z ; b: $b';
    print(s);
    var f = IF(1 > 2, 1, 2);
    print(f);
    return b;
  }

}
<<<< CODE_UNIT_END="/test" >>>>
<<<< [SOURCES_END] >>>>

<<<< [SOURCES_BEGIN] >>>>
<<<< NAMESPACE="" >>>>
<<<< CODE_UNIT_START="/test" >>>>
class Foo {

  int x = 0;
  int y = 10;

  int getZ() {
    return y * 2;
  }

  int calcB(int b1, int b2) {
    return y * b1 * b2;
  }

  int IF(bool b, int p1, int p2) {
    if (b) {
        return p1;
    } else {
        return p2;
    }

  }

  int test(int a) {
    var z = getZ();
    var b = calcB(z, 3);
    var s = this + " > a: " + a + " ; x: " + x + " ; y: " + y + " ; z: " + z + " ; b: " + b;
    print(s);
    var f = IF(1 > 2, 1, 2);
    print(f);
    return b;
  }

}
<<<< CODE_UNIT_END="/test" >>>>
<<<< [SOURCES_END] >>>>
